page.title: 04RECREATION
page.content: This is a popualar spot, for families with small children as there are lots of ducks, a few geese and a swan on the pond. Many people feed the birds. There is a garden at one side and seats to sit on supplied by Johnson Matthey. There are 2 houses on the pond and places to shelter. Round half the pond is a low brick wall. Moorhens and other wild birds use the pond aswell. The pond was cleaned out and renovated by a working party led by Mr. Dennis in the 1970's and therer are still regular working days by volunteers to keep it looking nice.
